name: Rudder Madness
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme of "Out of Control"

Steer your ship through dangerous waters, avoiding sea mines, sharks, and expecially typhoons! Colliding with a typhoon will randomly mix up your controls, but it's up to you to maneuver your way to the finish before time expires. Collect floating clocks to regain time, and try to complete all the levels. For an extra challenge, replay the levels to best your fastest times.

Controls: WASD + Space
